mapper.select: SELECT M_NO AS NO, M_T_NO AS TNO, M_NAME AS NAME, M_PRICE AS PRICE, M_BODY AS BODY, M_SAVENAME AS SNAME, M_GRADE AS GRADE, M_KEYWORD AS KWORD FROM MENU WHERE M_ISSHOW = 'Y'
SELECT B_NO AS NO, B_T_NO AS TNO, B_BODY AS BODY, B_DATE AS WDATE, T_NAME AS TNAME FROM BOARD INNER JOIN TRUCKINFO ON BOARD.B_T_NO = TRUCKINFO.T_NO WHERE T_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND B_ISSHOW = 'Y'

SELECT T_NO AS NO, T_CHEF AS CHEF, T_NAME AS NAME, T_PHONE AS PHONE, T_OPEN AS OPEN, T_EMAIL AS EMAIL, T_NUM AS NUM, T_ID AS ID, TI_SAVENAME AS SNAME FROM TRUCKINFO INNER JOIN TRUCKIMAGE ON TRUCKINFO.T_NO = TRUCKIMAGE.TI_T_NO WHERE T_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND TI_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND TI_GRADE = 1

SELECT TI_NO AS TINO, TI_T_NO AS TNO, TI_SAVENAME AS SNAME, TI_IMGBODY AS IMGBODY, TI_GRADE AS GRADE, T_CHEF AS CHEF, T_NAME AS NAME FROM TRUCKIMAGE INNER JOIN TRUCKINFO ON TRUCKIMAGE.TI_T_NO = TRUCKINFO.T_NO WHERE TI_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND T_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND TI_GRADE = 2 AND TI_T_NO = #{tno}

SELECT TI_NO AS TINO, TI_T_NO AS TNO, TI_SAVENAME AS SNAME, TI_IMGBODY AS IMGBODY, TI_GRADE AS GRADE, T_NAME AS NAME FROM TRUCKIMAGE INNER JOIN TRUCKINFO ON TRUCKIMAGE.TI_T_NO = TRUCKINFO.T_NO WHERE TI_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND T_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND TI_GRADE = 1 AND TI_T_NO = #{tno}
SELECT TI_NO AS TINO, TI_T_NO AS TNO, TI_SAVENAME AS SNAME, TI_IMGBODY AS IMGBODY, TI_GRADE AS GRADE FROM TRUCKIMAGE WHERE TI_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND TI_GRADE = 4 AND TI_T_NO = #{tno}

SELECT M_NO AS MNO, M_T_NO AS MTNO, M_NAME AS MNAME, M_PRICE AS PRICE, M_BODY AS BODY, M_SAVENAME AS SNAME, M_GRADE AS GRADE, T_NO AS TNO, T_NAME AS TNAME FROM MENU INNER JOIN TRUCKINFO ON MENU.M_T_NO = TRUCKINFO.T_NO WHERE M_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND T_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND T_NO = #{tno}
SELECT TI_NO AS TINO, TI_T_NO AS TNO, TI_SAVENAME AS SNAME, TI_IMGBODY AS IMGBODY, TI_GRADE AS GRADE FROM TRUCKIMAGE WHERE TI_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND TI_GRADE = 3 AND TI_T_NO = #{tno}

SELECT B_NO AS BNO, B_T_NO AS BTNO, B_BODY AS BODY, B_DATE AS WDATE, T_NO AS TNO, T_NAME AS NAME FROM BOARD INNER JOIN TRUCKINFO ON BOARD.B_T_NO = TRUCKINFO.T_NO WHERE T_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND B_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND B_T_NO = #{tno} ORDER BY B_NO DESC
SELECT SUM(RG_RANGE) FROM RANGECAL WHERE RG_T_NO = #{tno}
SELECT SUM(OM_NUM) FROM ORDERMENU INNER JOIN MORDER ON ORDERMENU.OM_O_NO = MORDER.O_NO WHERE O_T_NO = #{tno}
SELECT COUNT(O_NO) FROM MORDER WHERE O_T_NO = #{tno}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT PP_P_NO) FROM PLAN INNER JOIN PLACE ON PLAN.PP_P_NO = PLACE.P_NO WHERE P_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND PP_T_NO = #{tno}
SELECT SUM(OM_NUM) FROM ORDERMENU
SELECT COUNT(O_NO) FROM MORDER
SELECT COUNT(P_NO) FROM PLACE
SELECT COUNT(T_NO) FROM TRUCKINFO
SELECT COUNT(B_NO) FROM BOARD

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, a.* FROM (SELECT B_NO AS NO, B_T_NO AS TNO, B_BODY AS BODY, B_DATE AS WDATE FROM BOARD WHERE B_ISSHOW = 'Y' AND B_T_NO = #{tno} ORDER BY B_NO DESC) a) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNO, a.* FROM (SELECT TI_NO AS TINO, TI_T_NO AS TNO, TI_SAVENAME AS SNAME, TI_IMGBODY AS BODY, TI_GRADE AS GRADE, T_NAME AS NAME FROM TRUCKIMAGE INNER JOIN TRUCKINFO ON TRUCKIMAGE.TI_T_NO = TRUCKINFO.T_NO WHERE TI_ISSHOW = 'Y' ORDER BY TI_NO DESC) a) WHERE RNO BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
